content:
<rule id="javax-to-jakarta-servlet-00130" xmlns="http://windup.jboss.org/schema/jboss-ruleset">
            <when>
                <xmlfile in="web.xml" matches="//*[contains(text(),'javax')]"/>
            </when>
            <perform>
                <hint category-id="potential" effort="1" title="web.xml element references a javax-prefixed class name">
                    <message>
                        web.xml element references a javax-prefixed class name
                    </message>
                    <link href="https://access.redhat.com/articles/6980265#servlet" title="Red Hat JBoss EAP Application Migration from Jakarta EE 8 to EE 10 - Jakarta Servlet"/>
                </hint>
            </perform>
        </rule>
